meanings.definition: The quality or state of being stocky.
meanings.sent1: Her stockiness made her a great wrestler.
meanings.sent2: The bulldog's stockiness helped it excel in agility competitions.
meanings.sent3: The stockiness of the tree stump made it impossible to move.
meanings.sent4: The stockiness of the bouncer intimidated troublemakers.
meanings.sent5: The stockiness of the bear was a clear sign of its strength.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a thick, sturdy build.
meanings.sent1: The stockiness of the oak tree made it resilient to strong winds.
meanings.sent2: His stockiness was an advantage in the rugby match.
meanings.sent3: The stockiness of the bookshelf made it difficult to fit in the room.
meanings.sent4: The stockiness of the castle walls protected it from invaders.
meanings.sent5: The stockiness of the elephant was awe-inspiring.
